name: Puppy Pals - Racing Dogs
description:
Meet cute puppy dog pals who are here to entertain you! Pick your favorite baby pet friend and race to the finish line!

This game is designed for families! Play it yourself or invite your family to watch how you play (or even play together) these 1puppy dog pals racing game. many Dogs will meet you while you race! Just listen to the ducks quacking or birds chirping and drive along with them to reach the end of each level.

Game playable by all ages! This game is special for its easy, simple and family-friendly control - with just one finger. Enjoy fun races, but don’t forget that such racing games are one of the best game genres to play with your loved ones for learning new skills as problem solving, quick decision making, creative and flexible thinking, fine-motor and working-memory skills, self-control and hand-eye coordination.

This is the cutest puppy racing game that you can get! Enjoy funny sounds, colorful environment, playful music, surprising gameplay and cute dogs adventures! Puppy pals racing dog will be the new favorite game for your family!
